alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Bergland to near Park Falls. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lac Du Flambeau, Boulder Junction, Winchester, Squirrel Lake, Border Lakes Natural Area, Willow Lake, Rice Creek Natural Area, Presque Isle, Manitowish Waters and High Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
